messages.message: The world’s longest thread is back! C1 wants to know if the options are to *either* enable ACLs and grant access to apps as needed that way, or to use Admin access if ACLs are disabled. (They want to know if there are any other options, probably some kind of override if ACLs are disabled)
Ack, I forgot to check the “also send to <#C06FA6A23|> option”, but if you’ve got ideas about ACLs and Admin permissions, this thread is for you!
I would enable ACLs in org-owned repos and grant apps as needed (especially for C1 since they care so much about fine-grain control)

In this case, I think they’re trying to figure out if there’s a way to blend ACLs (e.g. an org with ACLs disabled _except for this user_*).* I’m also assuming this isn’t possible but just wanted to confirm
nope, we’re purely a grant based system. no way to take away from it once granted.
